list.name: Default
list.comment: changed japanese subtitles to be called external subtitles cleaned up code

task.summary: Default task
added mal html changed anime planet rating and date to mal rating and date
removed some logs
fixed allTitle text for sorting
added saving thumbnails to akashicRecords folder to save time opening app
fixed tags
fixed empty thumbnail not showing
added themes
added background images for themes
added cycle through themes shortcut added dark icons for summer, winter, etc
added wait cursor when clicking episode added different text color for watching episode links fixed black background at start
changed tag weight for anidb tags changed how tags are added added tag refresh if new json file is created
added age rating for shows getting animeDb and animePlanet links now made keyboard shortcuts for animeDb, animePlanet and mal
added recommendations
removed scroll to top in show page controller
added titles for show pages
added control click to open folder for show select screen
added ctrl click to open folder added ctrl a click to open anizb added ctrl d click to open nya
added new theme changed some theme settings

added update last years files
changed cover size in show selected page
fixed theme menu background color problem fixed ctr button on leaving frame problem
fixed update last year fixed getting tags and rating from html
fixed update last year fixed getting tags and rating from html

started grand clean up the code project (name subject to change)
created strings class create keyboard shortcut class created thumbnail class
added jar file paths to project paths
fixed the background colors in show folders to always be consistent fixed the scrolling to watching episode
made the show titles grow and shrink appropriately made background images not cache made selected show load large thumbnail instead of creating one each time

fixed background gradient for show catalog fixed spacing issue for search in show catalog fixed navigation arrow update in show catalog fixed params selected on refresh fixed clicking enter on search in show catalog
cleaned up some code
fixed background image for show problem

added sorting for watching shows
fixed titles fixed problem with space above show container
cleaned up code
added airing shows added general ids to show containers

added auto update for airing shows added user options for airing shows
removed userObject removed showInfoBasic
fixed date for airing shows fixed setting visibility for show containers
cleaned up code a bit
cleaned up code fixed selective update to only update the selected show changed webSearcher to ShowInfoCreator
changed recommendations cleaned up HtmlParser and changed its implementation a bit

changed how network user works added network options to AkashicRecordsSettings
cleaned up code a bit
changed projectPaths to use getMethods instead of static
removed animePlanet from html files removed alternative titles and replaced with mal and japanese title
changed how json files for shows are created and searched for
fixed the light and default theme finished the grand fix everything project, I think.
added alert for updating shows cleaned up code
added alert for creating thumbnails added a default title used for image names so they can be easily shared
fixed update from network fixed japanese font loss from network update fixed airing show list in catalog page fixed update airing show list in main
cleaned up code a bit
fixed cutting of error in show when title was too big updated show fxml
added boarder to images downloaded from aniDb
added notification to simplify alerts added notification for updating show from last year

added notification set text, title, header text reduced spacing problem on mac and windows for catalog page fixed header image no found on windows moved the deletion of json files on yearly update to after the new files are found
added background color change to match image in show page changed thumbnail update to run always not just on linux
changed notification implementation added notification for updating show that came out in the last year moved create tags and update shows inside of the notification fixed convert network to local
fixed problems that occur the fist time you run the app removed thumbnail recreation when opening a show
cleaned up code
fixed windows local and network paths
fixed files not opening over network between two windows machines fixed spacing issue in catalog page added sorting to studio tags in catalog page cleaned up code a bit
changed japanese subtitles to be called external subtitles cleaned up code
